headline: Chipotle Q4 2025 net income dips to $331m as comparable sales decline
summary: Despite a decline in comparable sales, the restaurant chain’s fourth-quarter revenue grew 4.9% year-on-year to $3bn.

content.title: Chipotle Q4 2025 net income dips to $331m as comparable sales decline
content.summary: Despite a decline in comparable sales, the restaurant chain’s fourth-quarter revenue grew 4.9% year-on-year to $3bn.

thumbnail.caption: Chipotle opened 334 company-owned restaurants in 2025. Credit: PJ McDonnell / Shutterstock.com.

headline: CMG Q4 Deep Dive: Value Push, Menu Innovation, and Margins Under Pressure
summary: Mexican fast-food chain Chipotle (NYSE:CMG) announced better-than-expected revenue in Q4 CY2025, with sales up 4.9% year on year to $2.98 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $0.25 per share was 4.9% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

content.title: CMG Q4 Deep Dive: Value Push, Menu Innovation, and Margins Under Pressure
content.summary: Mexican fast-food chain Chipotle (NYSE:CMG) announced better-than-expected revenue in Q4 CY2025, with sales up 4.9% year on year to $2.98 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $0.25 per share was 4.9% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Stocks to Watch Wednesday: AMD, Super Micro, Chipotle
summary: ↘️ Adobe (ADBE), Salesforce (CRM), Intuit (INTU): The three stocks ticked down premarket, suggesting Tuesday's sharp selloff in software stocks could abate in regular trading hours Wednesday. ↘️ Advanced Micro Devices (AMD): The chip maker recorded a one-third jump in quarterly sales and said data-center revenue could grow 60%-plus in the coming years as demand from AI hyperscalers grows.

content.title: Stocks to Watch Wednesday: AMD, Super Micro, Chipotle
content.summary: ↘️ Adobe (ADBE), Salesforce (CRM), Intuit (INTU): The three stocks ticked down premarket, suggesting Tuesday's sharp selloff in software stocks could abate in regular trading hours Wednesday. ↘️ Advanced Micro Devices (AMD): The chip maker recorded a one-third jump in quarterly sales and said data-center revenue could grow 60%-plus in the coming years as demand from AI hyperscalers grows.

headline: Stock Index Futures Steady After Tech-Led Selloff, U.S. ADP Jobs Report and Alphabet Earnings in Focus
summary: March S&P 500 E-Mini futures (ESH26) are up +0.11%, and March Nasdaq 100 E-Mini futures (NQH26) are up +0.01% this morning, steadying after yesterday’s tech-led selloff, while investors await the U.S. ADP employment report and a slew of corporate earnings reports, with a particular focus on results from “Magnificent Seven” member Alphabet.

content.title: Stock Index Futures Steady After Tech-Led Selloff, U.S. ADP Jobs Report and Alphabet Earnings in Focus

headline: Chipotle earnings, Walmart market cap: A look at consumer health
summary: Walmart (WMT) stock is trading higher after hitting $1 trillion market cap on Tuesday, while Chipotle (CMG) stock is under pressure following the company's fourth quarter earnings results, reigniting questions about pricing power and consumer affordability. Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Brooke DiPalma and Lossdog founder and CEO Tom Sosnoff join Opening Bid host Brian Sozzi to discuss Walmart's priorities, a value menu for Chipotle, budget-conscious consumers, and more. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.

content.title: Chipotle earnings, Walmart market cap: A look at consumer health
content.description:
Walmart (WMT) stock is trading higher after hitting $1 trillion market cap on Tuesday, while Chipotle (CMG) stock is under pressure following the company's fourth quarter earnings results, reigniting questions about pricing power and consumer affordability.

Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Brooke DiPalma and Lossdog founder and CEO Tom Sosnoff join Opening Bid host Brian Sozzi to discuss Walmart's priorities, a value menu for Chipotle, budget-conscious consumers, and more.

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.
